segments.text: I'm still mesmerized by the overflowing sink on the right side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water isn't just dribbling; it's a solid sheet pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down the fronts of the lower cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is literally standing in a puddle, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable how completely detached she is from the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the faint glint of light on the water as it spreads.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she reacting at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an active plumbing disaster unfolding right before her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of any urgency or even awareness is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself feeling annoyed on behalf of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene here.
segments.speaker: PAR
